#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: attributeGroup MediaTypeAttributes.

== Name ==

MediaTypeAttributes (attributeGroup)

  	

===  Documentation ===
        
				Group of common attributes used to characterise a media associated with either a country-club, a golf-course,
				or a hole, anywhere a media is accepted.
				The first attribute describe what the media content is, the second attribute is usable by computer
				and reprents the technical file format used.
			
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
            content-type = xs:string  other = xs:string  type = [SMediaTypeEnum MediaTypeEnum.html]
}}}
----
